attributes.action: Create a law to protect Coeliacs' abilty to safely consume food that is prepared by third parties.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make a law forcing all establishments serving and providing prepared foodstuffs to clearly display the wheat and gluten ingredients of all their products / dishes and provide clear labelling as to whether the products provided have been prepared in a gluten and wheat free environment or not. Ideally through a national labelling system for all supermarkets, manufacturers and eating establishments.
